newsitem.title: USA: Cable & Wireless has no plans for statement.
newsitem.headline: Cable & Wireless has no plans for statement.

text.p: Cable & Wireless Plc said on Wednesday it had no plans to issue any statement, despite a New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) symbol on the American depositary receipts (ADRs) indicating news was pending.

The Wall Street Journal said on Wednesday that C&W was considering making a bid for Sprint Corp, but a C&W spokesman told Reuters that no statement was to be made beyond the previous "no comment" on the report.
The NYSE confirmed that C&W ADRs were halted, though the company's shares were not suspended in London. Sprint resumed trading after an earlier imbalance.
Stock can be halted if a statement is to be made by another company concerning that stock. (( New York Newsroom 212 859 1610))
